title: Trigger a fresh rebuild and deployment (option 2)

requirements.text: Trigger a fresh rebuild and deployment of the latest FitGebit code (option 2), rather than publishing the already-deployed Draft Version 11 as-is.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is produced from the current codebase (not reusing the previous Draft Version 11 artifact).
The newly built version is deployed successfully and is accessible to testers/users via the platformâ€™s deployment URL.
If the platform distinguishes between draft and live, the rebuilt version is the one intended for production/live availability (not left as an unpublished draft).
No application features or user-facing UI text are changed as part of this request; this is a deployment action only.

constraints: Do not change any application functionality; only perform the rebuild/deploy action requested.
Keep all user-facing text in English (no new UI copy changes are required for this deployment-only request).
nonGoals: Implementing new FitGebit features or UI refinements.
Fixing unrelated issues (e.g., the previously mentioned black-screen crash) unless required to make the rebuild succeed.
